plot: Annie sends video diaries to her son who is fighting in Iraq with the British Forces. It isn't long before it becomes more than just a diary.
title: Do Not Erase
plot_es: Annie sends video diaries to her son who is fighting in Iraq with the British Forces. It isn't long before it becomes more than just a diary.
plot_en: Annie sends video diaries to her son who is fighting in Iraq with the British Forces. It isn't long before it becomes more than just a diary.
